title: 👀LOOK NO FURTHER!! MOVE IN TODAY!!😃
map_address: 4625 BOULDER HWY near BOULDER HWY & INDIOS
posting_body: WE ARE LOCATED ON THE CORNER OF INDIOS AND BOULDER HWY, ACROSS WELLS FARGO AND SINCLAIR'S GAS STATION.
Whether you are a family relocating to a new city, a business traveler, vacationer, or just making a new start here in Las Vegas we can be your living solution.
Our apartments are spacious, comfortable and equally affordable.
Our property is designed to serve you with many amenities including:
Cox Cable TV – Basic and HBO Channels
Wi-Fi – 1st Device $10.00 per week, each additional device $5.00 per week (within the same purchase)
Pet friendly - $200.00 Pet deposit each pet (non-refundable) plus $20.00 pet rent each week per pet
Do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
